summary: Comprehensive UI/UX testing for Ocean Color Malermeister website modernization completed. All key features tested including Angebotsrechner redesign with 2-column layout, selection cards, chip buttons, progress bar, live summary, Altbau-Modus badge, animated counters on Homepage, card hover effects, scroll-reveal animations, and mobile responsiveness.
